text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><DESCRIPTION>In denen Thurneysischen Buchlden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bcher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Sbscriptiones gedruckt worden.</DESCRIPTION> <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appell Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE><SUBTITLE>avec des Remarques d'Erudition & de Critique</SUBTITLE> <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon die 3. ersten Tom. dato schon zu beziehen sind; das gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 24</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son dien & de conserver sa sante</TITLE><AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR><AUTHOR>F. Marset, Doct. en Medecines</AUTHOR> .<VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>2vec fig., fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon der erste Tomus dato bey ihnen zu beziehen ist; di gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 18</PRICE></BIBL>. So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben: <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. <PRICE>L. 27</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofrest</TITLE> <VOLUME>2. Voll.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>. <PRICE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":14,"explanation":"The original XML was faulty in several ways. The fixes included: (1) adding a DESCRIPTION tag to wrap the introductory text; (2) correcting 'PRIZE' to 'PRICE' where necessary; (3) standardizing the use of '&' to '&'; (4) wrapping the subtitle in a SUBTITLE tag; (5) combining multiple authors under separate AUTHOR tags; (6) correcting inconsistent formatting for the FORMAT tag; (7) decoding some Unicode characters; (8) correcting tag inconsistencies (e.g., 'PRIZE' vs 'PRICE'); (9) ensuring that all bibliographic items are properly wrapped in BIBL tags; (10) fixing minor encoding issues; (11) adding missing tags for better structuring; (12) ensuring that all elements are properly closed; (13) making the XML more semantically meaningful; (14) correcting minor punctuation and spacing issues around tags."}

parsed.explanation: The original XML was faulty in several ways. The fixes included: (1) adding a DESCRIPTION tag to wrap the introductory text; (2) correcting 'PRIZE' to 'PRICE' where necessary; (3) standardizing the use of '&' to '&'; (4) wrapping the subtitle in a SUBTITLE tag; (5) combining multiple authors under separate AUTHOR tags; (6) correcting inconsistent formatting for the FORMAT tag; (7) decoding some Unicode characters; (8) correcting tag inconsistencies (e.g., 'PRIZE' vs 'PRICE'); (9) ensuring that all bibliographic items are properly wrapped in BIBL tags; (10) fixing minor encoding issues; (11) adding missing tags for better structuring; (12) ensuring that all elements are properly closed; (13) making the XML more semantically meaningful; (14) correcting minor punctuation and spacing issues around tags.
